nodes.text: Sheravin was a human male who held the rank of admiral in the Galactic Empire. When Beol De'Rruyet, founder of De'Rruyet Industries, planned to unveil a replicated Nihil Path engine, Sheravin contacted Lady Domina Tagge of the Tagge Corporation on behalf of Emperor Palpatine, warning Tagge that the Empire would rethink their relationship with her corporation if De'Rruyet's design was successful.
